title: 8 Pool by miniclip
text: This is and Excellent game that I and millions of people love playing Men Women & Children and especially professional an Master players fortunately I was taught the Science of the game by the very best,The Problem that I have faced Sense  playing eightball Miniclip making purchases some of the Expensive cues that you sale over four million in coins & cash also someone in your System Having access to my Visa card taking money and my expensive cues, that was never replaced,I stop playing for some time,I have not been compensated for what someone took for me, now when I play my balls are always potted someone are interfering with my shots causing me to lose,game after game,we have a problem that have to be addressed,Thank you for your time and professionalism.

title: To the complainer with a one star rating
text: I have been playing this game for years and yes on a mobile device. This game started great and has only gotten more technical and challenging. For those who don‚Äôt understand the value of force, friction, and speed with angles and distance playing a huge factor. It‚Äôs not just a point and shoot game. And you only wast your coins if you can‚Äôt win a match lol. I clear the table lots and set up my next shot before I even shoot my initial shot. Just trying to say man don‚Äôt dog on a game so hard when you don‚Äôt even know how to play and you say it‚Äôs unfair. Try learning it. I‚Äôm playing players that are hundreds of levels above me and I still beat them. Good luck in the future and hope to clean house on you some day. :)

text: Where did you to spend your money on buying extra stuff you don‚Äôt need to keep taking it I was just playing 14,000 points each and watch the game change right in front of my eyes I would get ready to shoot and the game would endWho is the boss know it was still my turn and they win the game at least for 400,000 coins I lost tonight it‚Äôs pretty expensive when you have to pay for it with American cash because they took you at the game is rigged you cannot win you will not get to that magic number it‚Äôs rigged  against you . as I watch the game change right before my eyes I would make two or three ball in when the game comes to an end and your opponent wins?

title: People keep cheating
text: I started playing pool again about a month ago and it wasn‚Äôt until recently that the games have started to glitch with certain people. Like today, I was playing the moonlight tournament and it was my break. I was against a dude from Morocco. The balls spread evenly on the table and the 15 ball went into the bottom right pocket. Next thing I know, the balls that were already broken on the table were mirror reflected on how they were already broken and then it was his turn. He lost his turn 4 balls in. So I start playing and no later did I get a ball in the table was once again turned and it was his turn (even though I sunk a ball.) Can we get the game producer to update this game to where people can‚Äôt hack it as easily? Because it‚Äôs starting to get irritating. Other than that, I enjoy this game.

title: Game pigeon has a better game
text:
8 ball is rigged. I decided to download it after a long time to see if it was any better, and it‚Äôs absolutely not. 

First of all, the matchmaking is a joke. Either you get some ‚Äúguest‚Äù that never misses, or you ALWAYS end up playing people 100+ in rank, and they‚Äôve all had 500+ million in winnings. 

Second, there are so many ads, it‚Äôs hard to find the actual playable game through them all. And it just begs you constantly to spend money on the app. 

Third, there‚Äôs a lot of randomness in shots. Found that out when I had some weird glitch where I would make a shot, see everything happen, and then boom, randomly nothing was where it was before. Fix that.

And last, this game basically steals your chips, then the amount of chips you get every 4 real life hours, is only 50. Then when you play with those 50, you play someone ranked 100+ who destroys you immediately. Feels like it wants you to pay for more coins and better cues huh?

Btw, I decided to leave this review after getting upset and doing an all in bet, if I won one of the best of 3, I decided I wouldn‚Äôt leave this review. I played someone rank 168 (I‚Äôm rank 23), he had 10 BILLION (10,000,000,000. That‚Äôs 10 whole zeroes) in winnings, while I had 1.3 million (1,300,000). I didn‚Äôt get a fair shot to even try. How does that matchmaking make any sense!? Horrible game, just use Game Pigeon with your friends.

title: This Game Robs You I CANT WIN A GAME ANYMORE. NO BOXES ARE CURRENTLY BEING OPENED
text: The gameplay is good. The problem is you will rank up to a point where the game will NEVER give you a fair break. You constantly play against opponents several leagues above yours and little things in the game that shouldn‚Äôt happen (and didn‚Äôt in the early stages) begin to happen. Spins not going right, leading to scratching the cue ball or your balls ALWAYS getting grouped up in pairs or trips along the wall. You run the table till the bad break then bam the other guy takes it. If I was reading this from the outside looking in I would assume this is just crybaby stuff. It‚Äôs not. There is a consistency to the getting done wrong that is UNREAL. God forbid you spend ANY MONEY with these people. After playing for so long I finally spent a little and haven‚Äôt won a game since. It‚Äôs almost as if they just want to drain me for real now so that I can spend more. Crazy. I just wish it would go back to how it was. It was fun. Now it gives chest pains.

title: What a joke!
text:
Physics basics based on a perfect table in a perfect world! Slop Rules in this game! Timers are wrong and shorts you time on your shots especially in 9 ball especially when certain country players are playing you. Must be a hack out there. Don't waste time, money, or electricity on this game! Go to a real pool hall and learn some real world physics....and some real world pool rules. You'll never make real money playing like this app allows! Lol!!!

So I was just about to take my last shot in a stinking 9 ball game when the my phone all of a suddenly went to the lock screen! When I got back in of course my time was up and the kid got the last shot. Just ONE of the MANY anomalies you will experience with the ALLOWED HACKS! NO FUN ANYMORE! It's the game folks, not winning or losing!!

title: The game can make some serious errors
text: The game is addicting, but it‚Äôs really starting to get on my nerves. When something is loading it freezes and when it comes back in the middle of a game it acts like I didn‚Äôt make shots I just made. If I just got matched up with someone and it happens to freeze it won‚Äôt even let me play plus it takes my money, and if I open a box and it freezes it doesn‚Äôt matter how long I waited to open the box it acts as if it never existed. At first I was fine but when it was loading it took the time I had to hit the ball and I come back and apparently I lost a chance. At first I was giving the app the benefit of the doubt but now I‚Äôm losing coins, chances to play, boxes, turns, and it keeps on telling me I didn‚Äôt just knock a ball in and it will literally re-appear when the next player takes the shot. It‚Äôs tiring don‚Äôt get the app especially if it starts loading just get another app at this point cause it‚Äôs really just ridiculous.

title: Rigged, annoying, but still like somewhat‚Äô
text: This game is a joke a lot of the times, for instance player bouncing their shots off of your ball to make the pocket, off the break if you hit the eight ball in you do not win the game when you supposed too, balls laying 75% in the pocket and do not fall, giving advantage to the other player that usually comes all the way back missing no shots, q-ball always seem to find a pocket to cause you to scratch, no matter how you hit it or spin it! Cues cost ridiculous money to purchase if you want a good one, should be trick shots or something to do to get one! Upgrading cues cost a lot, also upgrades to the cue your using isn‚Äôt definite in the area your playing in! It‚Äôs hard to gain and keep coins, I made it to 150k once and never again. Now, on the good side of the game sometimes it will let you go on a small win streak, 8 is my longest, then all of sudden 15 straight no matter what table.

title: They could not be any further away from the legit rules of pool
text:
I have reinstalled this game multiple times hoping to get maybe an update or two in regards to the changing of one thing that bugs me the most: the right to a color you pocket in at the start of the game. According to conventional pool, whatever color ball you put in first after you break the rack is the color you should be in charge of trying to hit in. The game makes it work less than half of the time. Also, the game wants you to directly hit the ball in, which means that you cannot hit an opponent‚Äôs ball into yours and have yours go in as a result of that. In conventional pool, you can do whatever means necessary to hit your ball in as long as you don‚Äôt scratch or accidentally hit the 8-ball in. 

MINICLIP, PLEASE READ THIS REVIEW THOROUGHLY!!!! DO NOT GLIDE OVER IT!!!! YOU GUYS DESPERATELY NEED TO HAVE AN UPDATE WITH FIXING THE GAME TO WHERE YOU CAN HIT YOUR OPPONENT‚ÄôS BALL INTO YOURS TO KNOCK IT IN!!!! I WILL NOT SPEND A SINGLE PENNY ON YOUR APP UNLESS YOU FIX THIS!!!!

title: Five stars but one flaw
text:
The heart eyes emoji needs to be removed. I don‚Äôt know who in their right mind would send hear eyes on 8ball pool. How desperate do you have to be to try to be flirty over an online pool game? I just figured it probably bothers a lot of women especially who use the app when the guy on the other end is a weirdo. What better way to make this better than to remove the heart eyes?? It needs to go. It‚Äôs so out of place, normal people probably don‚Äôt use it, and I think it just enables creepy behavior. This is pool, not a dating app. 
Other than that the game in all aspects is great. I even have cool looking cues from the win streak and pool passes without having to spend real money, which I really appreciate.

title: Coins received after winning matches
text: When you play matches you get the coins from your matches like today I had play the heist pool versus and I started with 10,000  coins now if the water pops is 1,000 coins then my coin value should go to 9,000 because of my wager now if I beat the other person who wagers 1,000 too and I beat them that means I get to keep my 1,000 coins that I wagered and I won a 1,000 coins off of them so my total of coins should be 11,000 after the win but no it stayed at 10,000 in which I already had to begin with so I didn‚Äôt win any coins even though I won the match this is not the first time it happens a lot this is a glitch on this app that needs to be fixed.

title: This a decent pool game
text:
Issues with the game is advantage to other player too often or the matching isn‚Äôt based on level but who is available which I get it... The person that starts is random and should be a coin flip or something. The line up is off sometimes for me even when straight but off shots are made for others. Would be nice to have tutorials on how to make specific shots. Have had a decent experience over all with game but sometimes have to throw my phone when it isn‚Äôt in my favor and shot should be made...

This games review is biased. Only if you enjoy the game will you be allowed to rate it. I‚Äôm sick of all the people that have game mods getting auto shots. I do like the report option but when the game over you can‚Äôt report. I have streaks of loosing and it don‚Äôt be my fault. More could be said but can‚Äôt remember to share at this moment.

title: Love the game but.      .......
text: As the title says I love the game but it has become increasingly frustrating and off putting do to the glitches crashes and outright cheats such as me breaking and having a good setup then it restarts and I have to break again my bought cues that give me benefits like a percentage of gold coins back never works pauses on my shot and then says the other person wins with me losing and the list goes on more than I can remember or feel like writing in this review but the bottom line is it has cost me hundreds of thousands to millions of gold coins at a time some of which I actually paid for with real money just like the cues that don‚Äôt work as they should that I also paid for again great game but needs lots of patches

title: This game is infuriatingly broken
text: I only play this game under WiFi, in fact im pretty sure that is the only way it works, and yet i am routinely disconnected during my turns and when that happens, i have made winning shots that have been erased or reversed only to lose my turn and i get to watch my opponent take that winning shot, and I‚Äôve had a game buffer out and return and have several potted balls taken back off the board and i get a notification that i ran out of time. I notice that sometimes there will be a connection problem during the opponents turn, but when that happens, the game comes back on with their full shot timer actually reset. So it sure feels like I‚Äôm the only one who gets screwed by ‚Äúconnection‚Äù issues. I‚Äôm sure other people have faced this issue, and I think they would agree that words cannot describe how much infuriating it is to pot the winning shot, only to have the screen glitch out and come back saying you lost your turn

title: Addictive but old
text: Fun game that seriously needs an update. I guess it‚Äôs supposed to look and feel likena casino look but that doesn‚Äôt mean you have to settle for a 10 year old looking interface. Same with sucky music and how the game constantly pesters with pop ups. These get highly annoying. Offers to challenge friends who just logged on is one example, they appear mid-game and since the friend-challenge function is so klunky, you pretty much need to leave the game to sync up with that person. But almost always, you don‚Äôt care bc it was a random friend add or bc you‚Äôre in the middle of a friggn game! And don‚Äôt get me started on the special offer pop-ups. They‚Äôre constant and makes the game feel very low budget and ratchet. But it‚Äôs not one start bc its basically an addictive game with features that keep it fresh: consumables, variety, tourneys, etc.

title: Please bring these features...
text: I have my friends who play 8 Ball Pool regularly for past several years. We often play among ourselves. But we can‚Äôt make a tournament among us. So could you please add a new feature where I can make a tournament with my friends? I can add my selected friends and a tournament will be arranged with them, without any strangers. At the same time you can add voice conversation feature where we can talk with our opponents specially when we are playing with friends because playing and text conversation is not very easy to do and it is not enjoyable. But talking and playing will be very interactive and fun. So please add these two features to your next update.

title: Game takes your coins
text:
After adding the cue upgrade feature, now your cue runs out of energy and you cant use it. The only way to use it again is recharge it which is annoying because it costs a couple hundred coins and sometimes a dont have them. This feature is extra terrible because it has an auto recharge, and nobody is gonna think when they are forced to change cues because a stupid piece of wood ran out of energy, that they should turn off the auto recharge. So i had 300 coins after a high stakes loss and it AUTO RECHARGED MY PIECE OF WOOD for ALL of my coins, and then i couldn‚Äôt play the game. Get rid of recharge, wood doesnt require you to plug in to an outlet and charge it up. ITS NOT A CELL PHONE ITS A STICK.

Also, people intentionally waste your time. They leave the game long enough for me to watch a full set of downs in football which last 30 seconds AT THE LEAST. Then my opponent magically reappears and beat me when they went afk long enough for me to have gotten the free win! CHEAP!

title: This Tiller here and the game cheats why?
text: Inaccurate, it‚Äôs arcadish, the game cheats. title: I like it, but it makes me mad
text: Really fun game but you can only advance so far without buying coins or cues etc. I advanced levels and opened up new playing spots pretty quickly but once I got into the big leagues where you pay a 10,000 coin entry fee, the opponents were like level 104 while I was level 13. I feel like you have to be really good and buy a lot of coins to keep advancing after this certain spot. It‚Äôs cool though it has tournament style and also nine ball you can add people as your friend and challenge them to a rematch whenever you‚Äôd like. You do get free stuff pretty often by playing you open up mystery boxes and you get free spins once in a while. Sometimes I‚Äôll play obsessively for a few days and then forget about it.

title: Know what you‚Äôre getting
text: At first it was fun, as long as you play lower wager games. As you build up winnings and play games with higher stakes that‚Äôs when the mysterious stuff starts to happen. Balls ricochet in directions that defy science. Shots lined up for an easy make somehow miss. Opponents with only 100 games of experience somehow have billions in winnings. Some of them (somehow with 80+ winning percentage) hit ridiculous once-in-a-lifetime shots 4 TIMES in the same game! Played 8-ball game and my opponent hit 3 or more balls in on one shot 4 times. Even hit all of mine in except one. Once played 12 games in a row not getting to break. Lost 9 of them. Shot strength seems to mysteriously change mid game. The me/opponent ratio of potting the cue ball is at least 10:1. Can‚Äôt count the number of times I potted the winning ball just to see the cue ball drop in as well. If you don‚Äôt mind investing time to find yourself getting screwed then this game is for you.

title: üòí
text: This game is fun. But it gets very annoying especially when you loose to someone a lower level. And some of the predicuments are invalid like being able to hit the cue ball when its on the edge still perfectly as if its in the middle of the board. The game will make you lose on purpose in order to let a lower level win. Its simple how they do ths really, if you think about it they can set their predicuments of how and which direction the ball will go in depending on how you hit it. Each hit will usually send you behing one of their balls leaving you with no shot what so ever having to pick a random spot to shoot, MISS,then you leave the perfect shot for the opponent to pot all his balls in a row just to lose to sum level 2 starter playing like hes been playing for years. Ik, its a game, but a very complicated game and even when you fi understand it, it still get annoying.

title: Denied by bots at high tiers
text: I used to love this game. I played my way up to about 500k coins. I get the 1 million coins from club leagues. First, I play Dubai (1mil prize) and get denied with someone with a default avatar, no club, and their country cue. Also has no collection frame. Then, I try Shanghai (2mill prize) and the bot gets the break again, and I get no chance to even shoot. I then go to Las Vegas with the 20 k I have left, and then this bot is shooting full power, purposefully missing shots to make me win. This is a vicious cycle, and you can‚Äôt win (at least for me) at the high tiers of you don‚Äôt get the break, which I get in Vegas 3 times in a row but 0 for to playing for millions. Very frustrating losing to something you grinded so hard for to lose to an algorithm. Don‚Äôt expect to get far as a free player. As the game gives you a tip for, buy coins to play at high tiers. Like the table design and 9 ball

title: This game is a 5/10 but there‚Äôs some things they need to fix
text: The game is okay but there‚Äôs many things that are wrong with this game. First reason, the spin the wheel is obviously rigged. Whenever your this close hitting the jackpot, the wheel would automatically move to the cheapest coins that would be 250 or 100. It would take years just to get 10k or a thousand off the wheel. Second reason, the hole bouncing is one of the most annoying things in this game. There‚Äôs times when I would hit the ball in the hole and it would just go side to side and bounce away from the hole. Third reason, the cue meter is broken and it‚Äôs rigged. While taking my time on how hard I should hit, the cue would just release by itself when I didn‚Äôt let go. Final reason is the stretching part, it‚Äôs literally impossible for me to have a game without scratching and whenever the white ball stopped moving by the hole, it would just fall in by itself.

title: Issues, but game has potential.
text: I used to LOVE this game years ago. Spent plenty of money and time playing it. But one HUGE issue I have is when I click to play a game and it freezes (even though I have perfect signal) and then I have to shut down the app only to come back and see they still took all my coins! It‚Äôs such a massive flaw I don‚Äôt understand how it hasn‚Äôt been fixed. Maybe don‚Äôt take the persons coins until the rack has been broke? Something! It makes it very hard to grow whenever you bet all your coins trying to move to the next difficulty only to have them all drained and have to start over. Well of course this same issue just happened again. When I complained about this last time I was simply told to ‚Äúget over it and they don‚Äôt guarantee my coins‚Äù. So pathetic customer service. Especially since I spent plenty of money on this game which most people spend none. You think I‚Äôd maybe be greeted with a little more respect.

title: DO NOT GIVE THESE GUYS ANY $$$$.
text: Don‚Äôt do it. This game decides when you win or lose. I am one of the people who started with nothing and have built my way to 1.3 billion. Take it from me - if this game wants your opponent to break, they will. If they want you to break but end up in a position to turnover, then you shall. Whatever happens after the break is 10% skill but by that time, the game has been decided. If you spent money on this game it‚Äôs because you wanted to see cooler looking cues. Truth is, you don‚Äôt need them, you just don‚Äôt. Miniclip needs to change players break ratios. 50/50. I played 10 games (9 Ball) just now and didn‚Äôt break a single time. I was lucky to win 2 of those games. This game is rigged and sorry Miniclip, I won‚Äôt fall for it, I won‚Äôt gamble all my money in order to tempt me to buy coins. This game tries to make you so frustrated that it hopes you are convinced that spending money on a ‚Äúchance‚Äù at getting a better cue will solve your frustration. DON‚ÄôT GIVE THESE GUYS A PENNY!

title: This game is bad , annoying, frustrating, and completely rigged. (my opinion)
text: Ok first off i‚Äôm deleteing this game after i say this. So i just installed this game for the first time in like 2 years and my first game goes well but my 3rd or 4th game i get put in a game with a 28 level guy first off how am i supposed to compete if i‚Äôm a new player like why can‚Äôt i get in a game with a player with my skill and when you get into a game with a play 100+ levels above you and you‚Äôre winning, don‚Äôt get your hopes up the player immediately turns the tables and instantly goes god mode and destroys you in less then 2 minutes. The spin thingy that you spin to get prizes do people even ever get the good things off that? i‚Äôve only EVER gotten the 250 or 500 coin one, so i think that‚Äôs rigged to. So overall in my opinion this game is rigged, frustrating, annoying, bad, and complicated. This game shouldn‚Äôt deserve all these 5 star ratings.

title: It‚Äôs Sad To Watch A Good App Die
text: I‚Äôve loved this game for years. It was way ahead of its time and a breath of fresh air in the App Store. It no longer is. The developers have taken a great game and loaded it with bells and lights and gimmicks and pop ups and 20 ways to monetize until now you literally CANNOT ACTUALLY PLAY THE GAME.  After you wade thru all the ridiculousness and get to the table with another player you will soon find that their servers can‚Äôt handle the load. Your ‚ÄòConnection Issues‚Äô will make you lose the last shot‚Ä¶ lose the game‚Ä¶ lose your money if you were unfortunate enough to waste it in this black hole of an app.  I keep reinstalling it every few months hoping they will have found a way to handle their own load.  They haven‚Äôt. Now there are better pool apps. If you‚Äôre considering this one go find one of those.  This app is like an ancient primadonna that has devolved into nothing but a cheap memory and a headache.

title: Game defect
text: I enjoy this game most of time. There is a defect in game that allows you to prolong the game even when it‚Äôs not your turn and it‚Äôs not only disruptive it‚Äôs absolutely ridiculous. Even after winning the game if opponent leaves screen without exiting game you have to sit there until it times out of opponent rejoins game, or quits in order to collect your victory. I would say most users don‚Äôt do this but plenty do and it takes away from the enjoyability. If this could be fixed by if you exit the game you forfeit. That‚Äôs fair. Or if you exit game at or during last shot you auto forfeit.I‚Äôm sure there is something the game creators can do to make the biggest issue with game go away. Rest of game is awesome. But 2 stars until glaring issue is fixed

title: 8 ball pool miniclip
text: This is my top favorite game but for a few flaws that could possibly be adjusted by you. I have purchased your discount k AIDS such as the scratchers, and a couple others. The scratcher goes on sale and at least three incidents happened where I did not receive the purchased merchandise. It takes out the payment and either gives me the regular amount, 5, or nothing at all. I tried to contact the game provider to no avail. Another problem is the wheel: it is not fair because it always avoids the big numbers and stops in 50, 100 or at best 500 but very seldom. Make it fair and stop putting governors on the wheel to make it stop where you want it to stop. Thank you.

title: Connection issues every single game
text: I‚Äôm on stable Wifi all the time and when I‚Äôm not I have 5g and get good connection pretty much everywhere I go, it‚Äôs highly disappointing when I have spent 200$ over the few months and previously and am completely done spending another dime on this game, all my winnings are lost no matter what I do due to connection issues. I‚Äôm infuriated and am expecting a solution, are you so big you can‚Äôt take care of your long term customers?? I am not the only one experiencing these issues either after browsing other reviews. title: Stop the Bot users
text: I‚Äôve been with this game for so many years .. it‚Äôs been fun and very entertaining,to even be very honest this is the only game on my phone .. I do not play any other game at all expect for this one .. but not until recent you don‚Äôt get the chance to enjoy the game as it had been .. to many people playing the game unrealistically.. this game is supposed to be enjoyable by the natural way it‚Äôs made but so many bots and unrealistic way of playing.. please fix this and let‚Äôs really enjoy this game .. thank you . For your stars it‚Äôs definitely a 5 start game for me but when you meet people who aren‚Äôt playing like humans it‚Äôs just not real anymore so once again please fix it

title: Oh miniclip..
text: Where do I start? Don‚Äôt get me wrong, I‚Äôm one of the best people at this game. I have 7 billion coins, so I want to start by saying. Since the 1.13.2 update, I‚Äôve been having so many ‚Äúconnection is slow, please wait‚Äù issues. Note that my WiFi speed is one of the fastest in the world..yes I‚Äôm at NASA Headquarters. Shouldn‚Äôt be any connection issues right? Wrong. This game is full of fake players from ‚ÄúIndia and Pakistan‚Äù. Note that you rarely get an American or Great Britain player. Also, I started a new account, they put me against a level 14! With no balls potted and no games played..explain that miniclip. You got caught and I‚Äôm going to expose you. Learn from me, I‚Äôve been playing 4 years. This game is fake..yes it‚Äôs made to take your money. Why do you think they throw an ad in your face when you lose? They charge $100 for 1.50mil coins and 1,000+cash..it‚Äôs not worth it. If you‚Äôre about to play this game, just know that it‚Äôs full of NPC players like every other game. Thanks

title: Good game, but‚Ä¶
text: It‚Äôs a fun game, don‚Äôt get me wrong. Physics are okay, however I have noticed as you progress into the game, scratches are more common than normal. I‚Äôve had balls that should have been clear shots just spin in the pot and never make it in. Besides all that, it‚Äôs an okay game. Here‚Äôs where the but comes in: the constant pop-ups to spend money are SO annoying. Every time you play a game, or complete a mission, there‚Äôs a huge pop-up trying to entice you to spend $5-$20. It almost comes to the point of rendering the game useless. It‚Äôs annoying to constantly have some sort of pop-up in the middle of what you‚Äôre trying to do, much less have one in the way every couple seconds. If it weren‚Äôt for that, I‚Äôd actually keep the game. But I got so frustrated with the pop-ups, that I deleted it.

title: AI is Ruining the Game
text: First time I noticed, my opponent was making incredibly fast, multi-bank shots.  Every shot was like this. By the time I even focused on the cue ball, another shot was made.  I experienced about six of these games.  Then it progressed to a three second gap between amazing shots.  Now, one or two normal shots then some aggressive and suspiciously accurate shots, if my opponent is behind, and then game over.  All of this doesn‚Äôt make for enjoyable games when I have some downtime.  Also my bets are much higher than your typical 100 chip match.  I reduced my play time.  I report the players but that becomes tedious as a player may just be good but ‚Ä¶ I have played enough to tell that something isn‚Äôt right.  I have spent maybe $25 over the years as the game designers deserve it but no more.  I‚Äôll play a few 100 chip games and then go do something else.  Next.

title: Lost all of my coins
text: I recently bought a new iPad and was excited to install this game and play it on a bigger screen. The app join two accounts and when it did I lost 5 million coins and my 96 player rating I reached out to the developer, told them what happened and to this day I have not seen anything it is a great disappointment to me. I had plenty cues and coins and now I‚Äôve been reduced to a bronze status, and a five player rating. I don‚Äôt even like playing the game now because I‚Äôve lost everything that I worked so hard for. I have reached out to them and they would not answer any of my emails. A very disappointed customer I am I‚Äôve even bought stuff on this site. Has this ever happened to anyone else I would certainly like to know, this is why they get a one rating you can have the coins and the player rating. I just find something else to do. Sincerely, a disappointing customer

title: This game is rigged!
text: If you wanna do really well on this game, you‚Äôre gonna need to put actual money into it because if you don‚Äôt, you‚Äôre gonna see that you‚Äôre gonna start losing a lot! Like sinking the cue, ball, or the eight ball when it doesn‚Äôt even seem possible to do either! And please, for the love of God don‚Äôt ever make a purchase and then stop making purchases because this game will punish you for it! I‚Äôve been playing this game for like 10 years the first 4/5 years never purchased anything then I made the mistake of purchasing a couple of things and ever since then my game has been wonky. The game is fun, but the creators are greedy and they keep hooking me up to some Facebook that isn‚Äôt mine! Making it impossible to play with my friends and family. There was a time when I would‚Äôve given this game five stars. Now they barely get two!

title: Confused and PO‚Äôd
text:
I was playing a tournament game, my opponent broke then I shot all my balls in for the exception of the blue 2 ball. I missed my shot and when it was his turn he wouldn‚Äôt shoot. I had no shot so it was his turn and again he he did not shoot. Of course it left me once again with no shot. So then he barely hit one of his balls not trying to make the shot thus my turn again. Time was running out on the game in the meantime. I made my last ball and was about to shoot the 8 when time on the game ran out. Every one of his balls on the table and he won the game???!!!! REALLY??!!!!! I‚Äôm ranked 37 and he was ranked 102! Is that how you reach such a high rank and win games?! 
I‚Äôm sorry but that was really messed up!!! SMH

title: Problem still continues.
text:
Game is good however, when it comes to challenges between friends, the app does not connect the players. I had many friends issue challenges and I accept however, the dial just spins, nothing happens. It is an on going problem which the developer seems to be in no hurry to correct. Update 7/22: problem still exists. Get challenged by friends accept challenge, does not go through. This is particularly frustrating when one of the challenges is ‚Äúchallenge and play with a friend‚Äù.
Update 8/11: the problem still continues when trying to challenge a friend. Game will not load up, the player selection reel just spins endlessly. Apparently, they have no interest in correcting this glitch.

title: The ‚ÄúSpin the Wheel‚Äù is rigged.
text: The game itself is a good game. They cram  -sell every chance they get which becomes annoying. But my biggest complaint is the Lucky Wheel Spin. There‚Äôs two of them. The second one is if you won or bought a spin. You used to be able to get some heavy cash if you won, but they fixed it so that the odds are very much against your favor. But that‚Äôs really not my complaint. My brother Ron Ken is the first one. The free spin. That one is so RIGGED to not land on anything more than a couple hundred bucks!!! I‚Äôve watched it skip, continue to spin or completely STOP one spot from a sizable win. Really??? Can the developers care to elaborate or justify this? I‚Äôm sure I‚Äôm not the only person who has caught on to this. Makes me not even want to spin. So if you‚Äôre going to cheat us out of a couple thousand dollars, at least make it look good..

title: Not really worth your time...
text: While I must admit that I enjoyed this game at first, over the last year+ of playing it I have become extremely frustrated by a number of issues. First, your real life skill level (i.e. Your eye for certain attainable shots) has nothing to do with gameplay as it appears to be mostly randomized. Second, the daily prize wheel has a decent variety of potential prizes, but is absolutely fixed against you. You can spin every day and you will only win 500$ at the most. Once I won 50k but with the potential odds the game is clearly screwing the player. Finally, if I am shelling out winnings to pay for a certain number of times putting masse on the shots and I don't use it on a shot it shouldn't cost one of the uses I purchased with winnings, yet this is how the game works after numerous updates which could have easily fixed this error. The game is stacked against you and they want you to pay to be successful

title: Same ol same
text:
This is a pay to win game as usual 50 dollars gets you a maxed out pool cue 20 gets you a very powerful one‚Ä¶if you win to much as a beginner they match you with ppl who have played one thousand plus matches with maxed out pool cues and offer you to buy powerful or maxed out pool cues after every match knowing you will lose a high percentage of games‚Ä¶i went from 77.3% to 63.1% because they started matching me against ppl who are on average 700+ matches and i only got to 84 matches played‚Ä¶overall the game looks good‚Ä¶but all in all in another pay to win or get beat enough and pay for the cue‚Ä¶either way you will end up deleting like me or paying‚Ä¶

Also they dont give you good cue pieces unless you pay for the box‚Ä¶the spin game is rigged to never give you any over 1k coins which is rare to land on‚Ä¶just don‚Äôt download the game it‚Äôs not worth it.

title: C
text: I really like this game, it‚Äôs addicting. But there is two problems, one being it‚Äôs HELLLA annoying when you run out of coins then you get about 20 pop-ups about buying something and everything costs money. Two, the scratchers and spin wheel is incredibly rigged. I‚Äôve only gotten a mediocre prize ONCE, then a terrible prize every time. I also don‚Äôt like how the game wants your money SOOO much that they take away the option to chat online because of chat packs. It‚Äôs exiting to collect and all but come on, I wanna scream profanities at random sweet people all around the world when they rob me of all my coins. (That‚Äôs a joke btw, a chat filter will be included anyways.) I also get super frustrated when a probably very nice gentleman named Bruno or something beats me in Jakarta when I only have enough to play one game.

title: Wasted time.
text:
I like the game. The gameplay is pretty good. It has the usual ups and downs.  More downs than ups but it‚Äôs just a game.  
What I do not like is the ‚Äúwaiting on your opponents response‚Äù message I get while either waiting on them to take a turn or whatever then case may be. If you have a timer, then it should be based on that and that alone. I don‚Äôt know why I would wait on my opponent if I am up and about to shoot again and I have to wait on my opponent?!  
If they‚Äôre going to leave the game then let them leave.  Let me play through til they do.  
 The other thing is the ads for purchases dropping down at the most inconvenient time but well played on the games part.  I can deny the purchase but it gets old.  If I wanted to buy something, I would. I don‚Äôt need your trickery to do it.  Makes me not want to play. 
Please stop

title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!
text: This app is a complete waste of time and even a scam, this app will take away every (coin) you have on your account after you lose a match. If you use in app purchases and buy coins the game will get rid of them seconds after you receive them, no matter what you do and no matter how much you earned at some random point you can be sure the game will take everything you have. This effects the games performance, customer survive, and makes you never want to play a game made by this company ever again. Very sad very weird, all I wanted was to play pool without having room to own a pool table. Moral of the story, if you want to play a nice round of pool and you don‚Äôt want to spend your time playing a useless game please pick a different pool app :) I‚Äôve found tons of apps since playing this one that don‚Äôt steal my money, save yourself some time, money, and sanity by just not getting this app !!!

title: Preposterous
text: Something is wrong with this game. I consistently go up against very suspicious players. Especially in high coin tables. In Tokyo recently, this dude hit the 8 ball in off the break and it reappeared in the center of the table as if it had not been touched. This guy just kept playing and he eventually beat me. Huh? Also, the shots don‚Äôt seem entirely accurate. About half the players I go up against make very suspicious shots, which isn‚Äôt too much trouble. Obviously the game is skill based, but then shots I line up consistently don‚Äôt go in even thought they look picture perfect and the cue ball goes in a bunch, even though, again, it doesn‚Äôt look at all like it should. There have also been several times where the 8 ball is randomly potted. Either you guys are rigging this, or there is a legitimate problem with hacks, and I am tired of it.

title: Fun&addicting but rigged and too many ads
text: I love this game, I've been playing it for years now. It's fun, they keep changing the game around to keep it interesting; such as different events where you can earn more coins, cues, etc. The game is rigged in a sense where you NEVER land on high coin amounts for spin the wheel/scratch offs which can be a little annoying, that takes all the fun away. I also believe I paid so that I wouldn't have to deal with ads, but there are too many in-game ads trying to get you to buy stuff in the game. You have to close 10 tabs of ads before you can actually play a game. I would give 5 stars if they reduced the amount of in game pop ups trying to get you to spend money, and at least put their game offers to the side so YOU can decide if you want to click on the ads and spend the money.

title: Great game, ruined
text:
The core gameplay is great, I have no complaints. It‚Äôs a satisfying and fun pool game. Sadly it‚Äôs ruined by an inundation of ads for in app purchases, overpriced pro membership, and rigged gambling mechanics. 

You are constantly bombarded with ads for in app purchases. Such as for season passes, pro membership, loot boxes, in-game currency, etc. They appear when you open the game, lose a match, and at any other random time.

The pro membership is currently $20 a month. You get some features like better loot boxes, leveling up faster, and better rewards for gambling. It‚Äôs just not worth it. It wouldn‚Äôt be that bad if you weren‚Äôt constantly having to decline pop ups offering it for purchase. 

The gambling aspects of the game are not in and of themselves bad, but they cost to much, and they are rigged. In one game you spin a wheel and win whatever it lands on. It appears that you have approx 1 in 10ish chance of winning the grand price. After months of daily spins plus spins I won by leveling, I not once won more than the minimum prize. 

The Developers have to monetize the game somehow. Since it‚Äôs free to play I can tolerate the in game currency, season passes, gambling games, loot boxes, and pro membership. The issue is it‚Äôs over done. It‚Äôs constantly forced in your face to the point it detracts from your enjoyment of the game.
